query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_lojas,
  SUM(total_servicos) as soma_servicos,
  AVG(taxa_reparacao) as media_taxa_reparacao,
  AVG(desvio_percentual_mes) as media_desvio
FROM resultados_mensais 
WHERE mes = 12 AND ano = 2025;
